tika-s0202t:587_0: Tena tena me upaparikkhatoti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā,
tika-s0202t:587_1: aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā”ti ca ādinā yena yena ākārena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ,
tika-s0202t:587_2: tabbipariyāyato nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsentaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-s0202t:587_3: tena tena pakārena upaparikkhato vīmaṃsantassa mayhaṃ evaṃ hoti evaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0202t:587_6: Kañcipi sikkhekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t:587_7: Cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ anuppādetvā accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā pariharitabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
tika-s0202t:587_8: Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ.
tika-s0202t:587_13: Ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeti “mātāpitūnaṃ lokiyamahājanassa cittaññathattaṃ mā hotū”ti.
tika-s0202t:587_14: Tathā hi suddhodanamahārājassa tathā varo dinno.
tika-s0202t:588_5: Atha vā daḷhabhattikadhātijanādiparijanasampattiyā ceva paricchadasampattiyā ca uḷārapaṇītasukhapaccayūpahārehi ca sukhedhito,
tika-s0202t:588_12: Tathā hi “appamattakampi kalabhāgaṃ dukkhassa na jānāsī”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0202t:588_13: Evaṃ santeti nanu mayaṃ raṭṭhapāla maraṇādīsu kenaci upāyena appatīkārena maraṇenapi tayā akāmakāpi vinā bhavissāma,
tika-s0202t:588_16: Kiṃ panāti ettha kinti kāraṇatthe paccattavacananti dassento āha “kena pana kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0202t:589_1: Paricārehīti parito tattha tattha yathāsakaṃ visayesu cārehi.
tika-s0202t:589_5: Tathābhūto ca yasmā laḷanto kīḷanto nāma hoti,
tika-s0202t:590_1: Balaṃ gahetvāti ettha balaggahaṇaṃ nāma kāyabalassa uppādanamevāti āha “kāyabalaṃ janetvā”ti.
tika-s0202t:590_2: Evaṃ viharantoti yathā pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ evaṃ eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto viharanto.
tika-s0202t:590_6: Cirena pabbajito dvādasame vasse arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0202t:590_8: taṃ saṭṭhi vassāni tato adhikampi vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasante upādāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:591_5: abhidosaṃ vā paccūsakālaṃ gato patto atikkantoti ābhidosiko.
tika-s0202t:592_1: Gharaṃ pavisitvāti gehasāminiyā nisīditabbaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ antogehaṃ pavisitvā.
tika-s0202t:592_4: Gharesu sālā hontīti gharesu ekamante bhojanasālā honti pākāraparikkhittā susaṃvihitadvārabandhā susammaṭṭhavālikaṅgaṇā.
tika-s0202t:594_0: Pūtikummāso chaḍḍanīyadhammo tassa gehato laddhopi na dātabbayuttako dāsijanena dinnoti āha “deyyadhammavasena neva dānaṃ alatthamhā”ti.
tika-s0202t:594_2: tassa pana ujukaphāsusamācāravasena aladdhattā vuttaṃ “na paccakkhāna”nti. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t:594_4: “Neva dāna”ntiādi paccāsīsāya akkhantiyā ca vuttaṃ viya pacurajano maññeyyāti tannivattanatthaṃ adhippāyamassa vivarituṃ “kasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:595_1: Mudukassapi hi ekāsanikassa yāya nisajjāya kiñcimattaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t:595_2: vattasīsenapi tato vuṭṭhitassa puna bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-s0202t:595_3: Tenāha tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0202t:595_4: Ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikoti purato pacchato ca āhaṭabhikkhampi aggahetvā bahidvāre ṭhatvā pattavissajjanameva karoti.
tika-s0202t:595_8: Paṇḍitā hi mātāpitūnaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ anuggahaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā dhutaṅgasuddhikā na bhavanti.
tika-s0202t:596_2: taddhitalopaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ yathā aññatthāpi “pitāmahaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā,
tika-s0202t:596_6: Aññatoti imassa dinnattā aññasmiṃ kule anubhavitabbasampattito.
tika-s0202t:597_1: Cittavicittanti kappanāya ceva araharūpena alaṅkārādinā ca cittitañceva vicittitañca.
tika-s0202t:597_3: Samantato ussitanti heṭṭhimakāyavasena heṭṭhā upari ca sannissitaṃ.
tika-s0202t:597_10: parissavabhāvāpatti ceva vināsapatti ca ekantikāti attho.
tika-s0202t:599_2: Cuṇṇakamakkhitanti dosanīharaṇehi tāpadahanādīhi katābhisaṅkhāramukhaṃ gorocanādīhi obhāsanakacuṇṇehi makkhitaṃ,
tika-s0202t:601_0: Viravamāneti “ayaṃ palāyati, gaṇha gaṇhā”ti viravamāne. Hiraññasuvaṇṇaorodheti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:603_2: Ye byādhinā abhibhūtā sattā jiṇṇakappā vayohānisattā viya honti,
tika-s0202t:603_9: Dvattirājaparivattasaṅkhātaṃ addhānaṃ kālaṃ gato vītivattoti addhagato.
tika-s0202t:603_10: Tathā ca paṭhamavayaṃ majjhimavayañca atīto hotīti āha “addhānaṃ atikkanto”ti.
tika-s0202t:604_8: imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya kimaññatra bālyā”ti suttapadaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t:604_11: Samo vepāko etissā atthīti samavepākinī, tāya.
tika-s0202t:604_12: Teneva samavepākinibhāvena sabbampi sammadeva gaṇhāti dhāretīti gahaṇī.
tika-s0202t:604_13: Gahaṇisampattiyā hi yathābhuttaāhāro sammadeva jīranto sarīre tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0202t:604_14: no aññathā bhuttabhutto āhāro jīrati gahaṇiyā tikkhabhāvena.
tika-s0202t:604_15: Tatheva tiṭṭhatīti bhuttākāreneva tiṭṭhati gahaṇiyā mandabhāvato.
tika-s0202t:604_16: Bhattacchando uppajjateva bhuttaāhārassa sammā pariṇāmaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0202t:604_18: Pattānaṃ bhogānaṃ parikkhiyamānaṃ na sahasā ekajjhaṃyeva parikkhayaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0202t:605_2: Yasmā vā ye dhammā uddisitabbaṭṭhena “uddesā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0202t:605_3: Teva dhammā niddisitabbaṭṭhena niddesāti “dhammaniddesā uddiṭṭhā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0202t:605_4: Atha vā ye dhammā aniccatādivibhāvanavasena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ desessanti,
tika-s0202t:605_5: te dhammā tatheva nissesato desessantīti evaṃ uddesaniddesapadānaṃ anatthantaratā veditabbā.
tika-s0202t:605_11: Upanīyyatīti vā jarāmaraṇena loko sammā nīyati,
tika-s0202t:605_13: Tāyitunti jātiādibyasanato rakkhituṃ samatthena issarena attanā virahitoti.
tika-s0202t:605_15: jarābyādhimaraṇānaṃ taṃ adhibhavituṃ na dassāmī”ti evaṃ abhisaratīti abhissaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t:605_16: lokassa sukhassa dātā hitassa vidhātā koci issaro,
tika-s0202t:605_20: Taṇhāya vase jāto taṇhāya vijitoti katvā “taṇhāya dāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:606_1: Hatthivisayattā hatthisannissitattā vā hatthisippaṃ “hatthī”ti gahitanti āha –
tika-s0202t:606_4: Sātisayaṃ ūrubalaṃ etassa atthīti ūrubalīti āha –
tika-s0202t:606_6: tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:606_7: Abhinnaṃ parasenaṃ bhindato bhinnaṃ sakasenaṃ sandhārayato upatthambhayato.
tika-s0202t:606_8: Bāhubalīti etthāpi “yassa hi phalakañca āvudhañca gahetvā”tiādinā attho vattabbo,
tika-s0202t:606_9: idha pana parahatthagataṃ rajjaṃ āharituṃ bāhubalanti yojanā.
tika-s0202t:606_10: Yathā hi “ūrubalī”ti etthāpi bāhubalaṃ anāmasitvā attho,
tika-s0202t:606_11: evaṃ “bāhubalī”ti ettha ūrubalaṃ anāmasitvā attho veditabbo,
tika-s0202t:606_14: Alaṃ samattho attā etassāti alamatthoti āha “samatthaattabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0202t:607_4: vattissantī”ti idampi so rājā upari dhammuddesassa kāraṇaṃ āharanto āha.
tika-s0202t:608_0: Vuttasseva anu pacchā gāyanavasena kathanaṃ anugīti.
tika-s0202t:608_1: Tā pana gāthā dhammuddesānaṃ desanānupubbiṃ anādiyitvāpi yathārahaṃ saṅgaṇhanavasena anugītāti āha “catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ anugīti”nti.
tika-s0202t:609_0: 307. Ekanti ekajātiyaṃ. Vatthukāmakilesakāmā visayabhedena bhinditvā tathā vuttāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t:613_3: Saṃsāraṃ āpajjitvāti bhavādīsu saṃsārassa āpajjanahetuṃ āpajjanto paralokaṃ upeti,
tika-s0202t:613_5: Tādisassāti tathārūpassa gabbhavāsadukkhādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtassa appapaññassa añño appapañño ca abhisaddahanto hitasukhāvahanti pattiyāyanto.
tika-s0202t:614_0: “Pāpadhammo”ti vuttattā tādisassa paraloko nāma duggati evāti āha “paramhi apāyaloke”ti.
tika-s0202t:616_1: Ettha ca ādito dvīhi gāthāhi catuttho dhammuddeso anugīto.
tika-s0202t:616_6: aṭṭhamādīhi pavattinivattīsu kāmesu nekkhamme ca yathārahaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsaṃ vibhāvetvā attano pabbajjakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0202t:616_8: tena vuttaṃ “tā pana gāthā dhammuddesānaṃ desanānupubbiṃ anādiyitvāpi yathārahaṃ saṅgaṇhanavasena anugītā”ti.
tika-s0202t:619_1: Pubbe maghadevo nāma rājāti atītakāle imasmiṃyeva kappe anekavassasahassāyukesu manussesu paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0202t:619_2: uppannānaṃ caturāsītisahassānaṃ cakkavattirājūnaṃ ādipuriso maghadevoti evaṃnāmo rājā.
tika-s0202t:620_3: Tadā brahmavihārādibhāvanādhammassa rañño anadhigatattā tassapi vā anabhijjhādīhi samānayogakkhamattā vuttaṃ “dasakusalakammapathe ṭhito”ti.
tika-s0202t:620_5: Tathā hi ca so pakkhapātābhāvato “samo”ti vuccatīti āha “samaṃ caratī”ti.
tika-s0202t:620_10: aññaṃ negamajanapadacārittanti te visuṃ gahitā “negamesu ceva janapadesu cā”ti.
tika-s0202t:621_5: tvaṃ tassa kese gahetvā mā vissajjehī”ti maccudevassa āṇākarā dūtā viyāti dūtāti vuccanti.
tika-s0202t:621_6: Alaṅkatapaṭiyattāyāti idaṃ attano dibbānubhāvaṃ āvikatvā ṭhitāyāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:621_9: Te hi carimabhave bodhisattānaṃ jiṇṇādike dassenti.
tika-s0202t:622_1: Antimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ visuddhidevehi upaṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ upādāya tadaññesaṃ tehi anupaṭṭhāpitānampi
tika-s0202t:622_2: paṇḍitānaṃ tathā voharitabbatā pariyāyasiddhāti āha “iminā pariyāyenā”ti.
tika-s0202t:623_1: disāsīsena desā vuttāti desānaṃ adhipatirājāti attho.
tika-s0202t:623_3: Te panettha yasmā palitattā avisesato sabbapacchimavayasandassakā honti,
tika-s0202t:624_0: Purisayugo yasmā tasmiṃ vaṃse sañjātapurisaṭṭhitiyā paricchinno,
tika-s0202t:624_2: Rājagehato āhaṭabhikkhāya yāpentoti iminā kumārakapabbajjāya upagatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0202t:625_0: Parihariyamānovāti aññena aññena parihariyamāno viya velāya velāya tena mahatā parijanena upaṭṭhiyamāno kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷīti attho.
tika-s0202t:625_1: Keci pana “parihariyamāno evā”ti avadhāraṇavasena atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0202t:625_2: tathā sati caturāsītivassasahassāni thaññapāyī taruṇadārako ahosīti āpajjatīti tadayuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:626_1: Savaṃsavasena āgatā puttanattuādayo puttā ca paputtā ca etissāti puttapaputtakā paramparā.
tika-s0202t:626_4: Nihatanti vā satataṃ patiṭṭhitabhāvena vaḷañjitanti attho.
tika-s0202t:626_6: Atirekatarā dve guṇāti mahāsattassa maghadevakālato atirekatarā dve guṇā itararājūhi pana atirekatarā anekasatasahassappabhedā eva guṇā ahesunti.
tika-s0202t:627_1: Tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ,
tika-s0202t:627_4: Nivāsabhāvo ca tesaṃ tattha nibbattanapubbakoti āha –
tika-s0202t:627_7: Ovāde ṭhatvāti “sīlaṃ arakkhanto mama santikaṃ mā āgacchatū”ti niggaṇhanavasenapi,
tika-s0202t:627_8: “ekantato mama vijite vasantena sīlaṃ rakkhitabba”nti evaṃ pavattitaovādavasenapi ovāde ṭhatvā.
tika-s0202t:628_0: Atha nanti mahājutikaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ mahānubhāvaṃ nimirājānaṃ.
tika-s0202t:628_2: tava santikamāgato”ti attano sakkabhāvaṃ pavedetvā “kaṅkhaṃ te paṭivinodessāmī”ti āha.
tika-s0202t:629_1: Guṇavisiṭṭhatāyāti lābhayasādīnañceva piyamanāpatādīnañca āsavakkhayapariyosānānaṃ nimittabhāvena uttamaguṇatāya.
tika-s0202t:629_3: so attano purimajātiyaṃ paccakkhasiddhaṃva dānato sīlaṃ mahantaṃ vibhāvento “ahañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t:629_4: Tattha attanā vasiyamānaṃ kāmāvacaradevalokaṃ sandhāya “pettivisayato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:629_5: Tassa hi kappasatasahassaṃ vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa pūritapāramissa devaloko petaloko viya upaṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0202t:631_0: Imassa mama adiṭṭhapubbarūpaṃ disvā “ahudeva bhaya”nti cintetvā āha “avikampamāno”ti.
tika-s0202t:631_1: Bhāyanto hi cittassa aññathattena kāyassa ca chambhitattena vikampati nāma.
tika-s0202t:631_3: Sukhaṃ kathetuṃ hotīti puññaphalaṃ kathetuṃ sukhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t:632_1: Manaṃ āgamma yuttāyeva hontīti mātalissa sakkasseva cittaṃ jānitvā yuttā viya honti,
tika-s0202t:632_5: Naddhito paṭṭhāyāti rathapañjarapariyantena akkhassa sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ naddhī,
tika-s0202t:632_10: tāva attano ānubhāvena heṭṭhāmukhameva rathaṃ pesesi,
tika-s0202t:632_11: evaṃ candamaṇḍalassa gamanavīthito yāva rañño pāsādo,
tika-s0202t:632_13: Dve magge dassetvāti patodalaṭṭhiyā ākāsaṃ vilikhanto viya attano ānubhāvena nirayagāmī devalokagāmī cāti dve magge dassetvā.
tika-s0202t:632_15: yathā tena rathena gacchantassa nirayo devaloko ca pākaṭā honti,
tika-s0202t:633_0: Vuttakāraṇameva sandhāyāha mahāsatto “ubhayeneva maṃ mātali nehī”ti.
tika-s0202t:634_3: Gaṇadevaputtānanti gaṇavasena puññaṃ katvā gaṇavaseneva nibbattadevaputtānaṃ.
tika-s0202t:635_2: Kassapassa bhagavato sāsane ekaṃ khīṇāsavattherantipi vadanti.
tika-s0202t:635_3: Mātāva puttaṃ sakimābhinandīti yathā pavāsato āgataṃ puttaṃ mātā sakiṃ ekavāraṃ āgatakāle abhinandati,
tika-s0202t:636_1: Sakko cittaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontoti mahāsatte pavattaṃ devatānaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ attano
tika-s0202t:636_2: usūyacittaṃ bahi anāvikatvā abbhantareyeva ca naṃ ṭhapetuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0202t:636_3: Aññesaṃ puññena vasāhīti sakkassa mahāsattaṃ rosetukāmatāya ārādhanaṃ nidasseti.
tika-s0202t:636_5: taṃ upādāya jarājiṇṇaṃ viya katvā “jarasakko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:637_1: Sesaṃ sabbanti pabbajjupagamanā sesaṃ attano vaṃse porāṇarājūnaṃ rājacārittaṃ.
tika-s0202t:637_3: apabbajitabhāvavacanenevassa brahmavihārabhāvanādīnaṃ pabbajjāguṇānaṃ abhāvo dīpito hoti.
tika-s0202t:638_3: kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggādipaccayasamavāye sati sīlavataṃ kalyāṇavattaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0202t:638_4: Dussīlena samucchinnaṃ nāma hoti tassa tattha nirāsabhāvena paṭipattiyā eva asambhavato.
tika-s0202t:641_7: Jātigottādipaññāpanaṭṭhānesūti jātigottādivasena suddhacintāyaṃ brāhmaṇā eva suddhajātikā,
tika-s0202t:641_9: Saṃsārato vā suddhacintāyaṃ brāhmaṇāva sujjhanti vedavihitassa suddhavidhino aññesaṃ avisayattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t:641_10: Taṃ panetaṃ tesaṃ virujjhati khattiyavessānampi mantajjhenassa anuññātattā,
tika-s0202t:641_15: Ime pana mukhato niggato hutvā ure saṃvaḍḍhāti dassetuṃ “orasā mukhato jātā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:641_19: Ime pana paccakkhato brahmunā nimmitāti brahmanimmitā,
tika-s0202t:641_20: tato eva brahmato laddhabbavijjādidāyajjadāyādāti brahmadāyādāti sabbametaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ katthanāpalāpasadisaṃ
tika-s0202t:641_21: viññūnaṃ appamāṇaṃ avimaddakkhamaṃ vācāvatthumattaṃ brahmakuttasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0202t:641_26: na tassa attho tehi adhippetappakāro atthi.
tika-s0202t:642_5: “issariyasampattassā”ti nesanti etesaṃ catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ ettha pubbuṭṭhāyibhāvādinā itarehi upacaritabbatāya na kiñci nānākaraṇanti yojanā.
tika-s0202t:643_7: Ettha ca khattiyādīsu yo yo issaro,
tika-s0202t:643_10: pabbajitehi laddhabbasāmīcikiriyāya ca aṇumattopi viseso natthi,
tika-s0202t:643_11: tasmā so visesābhāvo pāḷiyaṃ tattha tattha vāre “evaṃ sante”tiādinā vibhāvito.
tika-s0202t:646_0: 324. Olokanakapadumanti līlāaravindaṃ. Tasmāti kokanadasaṇṭhānattā kokanadoti saṅkhaṃ labhi.
tika-s0202t:647_4: Olokanatthaṃyevāti na kevalaṃ bhagavato āgamanaññeva olokanatthaṃ,
tika-s0202t:647_5: atha kho attano patthanāya santharāpitāya celapaṭikāya akkamanassapi.
tika-s0202t:648_1: Aññova bhaveyyāti tasmiṃ attabhāve mātugāmato añño idāni bhariyābhūto mātugāmo bhaveyya.
tika-s0202t:648_2: Puttaṃ labheyyāti attano kammavasena puttaṃ, no tassa.
tika-s0202t:648_4: Imehi kāraṇehīti tassa rājakumārassa buddhaṃ paṭicca micchāgahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t:648_6: anāgate manussānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddissa vippaṭisāroti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0202t:650_1: Atha naṃ bhagavā tato micchābhinivesato vivecetukāmo “so kho aha”ntiādinā attano dukkaracariyaṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0202t:650_2: Mahāsaccake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ “so kho aha”ntiādipāṭhassa tattha āgataniyāmeneva āgatattā.
tika-s0202t:651_1: Aṅkusaṃ gaṇhanti etena tassa gahaṇe cheko hotīti aṅkusagahaṇasippaṃ.
tika-s0202t:651_4: Ubhayavasena ca tassa tathā sītuṇhaututo eno āgatoti ta-
tika-s0202t:652_1: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti kosambinagare parantaparañño aggamahesibhāvato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0202t:653_6: Kiñcāpi paccekabodhisattānampi abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya āgatā āgamanasaddhā eva,
tika-s0202t:653_7: mahābodhisattānaṃ pana saddhā garutarāti sā eva gahitā.
tika-s0202t:653_10: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti kenaci akampiyabhāvena ratanattayaguṇe ogāhitvā kappanaṃ.
tika-s0202t:653_16: Nicchitasubuddhatāya dhammassa sudhammatā saṅghassa suppaṭipatti vinicchitā eva hotīti āha “desanāsīsameva ceta”ntiādi.
tika-s0202t:653_17: Tassa padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ ijjhati ratanattayasaddhāya “imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti padhānānuyoge avaṃmukhasambhavato.
tika-s0202t:654_1: Aguṇaṃ pakāsetā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjitā sammāpaṭipattiyā visodhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0202t:654_2: Udayañca atthañca gantunti “avijjāsamudayā”tiādinā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca jānituṃ.
tika-s0202t:654_5: Nibbijjhitunti tadaṅgavasena pajahituṃ samucchedappahānassa paccayo bhavituṃ.
tika-s0202t:654_6: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ khīyatīti kilesesu appahīnesu tena tadupanissayakammaṃ paṭicca yaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-s0202t:655_0: 345. Sesadivaseti sattadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva dve rattindivā.
tika-s0202t:656_4: Ārakkho panassa paccupaṭṭhito hotīti mātarā gahitasaraṇaṃ gabbhavuṭṭhitassa tassa saraṇagamanaṃ pavedayitassa kusalaṃ saraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-s0202t:656_7: Sārentīti yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathābalaṃ ratanattayaguṇapatiṭṭhāpanavasena assa sārenti.
tika-s0202t:659_1: Aṅgulīnaṃ mālaṃ dhāretīti iminā anvatthā tassa samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0202t:659_3: Karīsasahassakhette ekasālisīsaṃ viya apaññāyamānasakakicco hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t:659_4: Takkasīlaṃ pesayiṃsu “tādisassa ācariyassa santike sippuggahasammāpayogena diṭṭhadhammike samparāyike ca atthe jānanto bhāriyaṃ na kareyyā”ti.
tika-s0202t:659_5: Bāhirakā ahesuṃ ahiṃsakassa vattasampattiyā ācariyassa cittasabhāvato nibbattanatibhāvena.
tika-s0202t:660_0: Gaṇanampi na uggaṇhātīti gaṇanavidhimpi na sallakkheti.
tika-s0202t:660_2: Ṭhapitaṭṭhāneti rukkhagacchantarādike ṭhapitaṭṭhāne sakuntasiṅgālānaṃ vasena aṅguliyo vinassanti.
tika-s0202t:660_6: Rājā avissāsanīyo issariyamadena dhanalobhena ca kadāci jīvite saṅkābhāvato.
tika-s0202t:661_1: Saṅkaritvāti “mayaṃ ekajjhaṃ sannipatitvā coraṃ māretvā vā palāpetvā gamissāmā”ti saṅkaraṃ katvā.
tika-s0202t:662_7: ṭhito aṭṭhitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ bodhimūle eva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0202t:662_9: evaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā anāgatepi sandhāvissatīti dassento “idānī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t:664_1: Ettovāti ato eva āgatamaggeneva sāvatthiṃ gatā.
tika-s0202t:664_2: Adhivāsessatīti “coraṃ paṭisedhetuṃ gamissāmī”ti vutte tuṇhī bhavissati.
tika-s0202t:664_3: Dāruṇakammena uppannanāmanti “aṅgulimālo”ti imaṃ nāmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0202t:665_1: Hatthī araññahatthī honti manussānaṃ tattha gantuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā,
tika-s0202t:665_3: Kūṭasahassānaṃ bhijjanakāraṇaṃ hoti therassa āgamanabhayena ghaṭe chaḍḍetvā palāyanena.
tika-s0202t:665_8: Ariyā nāma jāti pabbajjā ariyabhāvatthāya jātīti katvā.
tika-s0202t:666_1: Tathā hi naṃ thero sabbabhāvena ariyāya jāto saccādhiṭṭhānena akāsi.
tika-s0202t:666_4: Gabbho hi paripakko sampajjamāno vijāyanakāle kammajavātehi sañcāletvā parivattito uddhaṃpādo adhosīso hutvā yonimukhābhimukho hoti,
tika-s0202t:666_5: evaṃ so kassaci alaggo sotthinā bahi nikkhamati,
tika-s0202t:666_6: vipajjamāno pana viparivattanavasena yonimaggaṃ pidahitvā tiriyaṃ nipajjati,
tika-s0202t:666_8: sā tattha kammajavātehi aparāparaṃ parivattamānā byākulā mūḷhagabbhāti vuccati,
tika-s0202t:667_0: Saccakiriyā nāma buddhāsayaṃ attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā katā,
tika-s0202t:667_1: tasmā saccakiriyā vejjakammaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:667_3: Ime dve hetū paṭicca bhagavā theraṃ saccakiriyaṃ kāresi.
tika-s0202t:668_4: sadisampi ca nāma tadevāharīyati yathā “tasseva kammassa vipāko”ti ca “sā eva tittirī tāneva osadhānī”ti ca.
tika-s0202t:668_5: Idāni tameva sabhāgataṃ dassetuṃ “kammaṃ hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0202t:669_3: Diṭṭhadhammānantarabhavato aññasmiṃ attabhāvapariyāye attabhāvaparivatte veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyāyavedanīyaṃ.
tika-s0202t:669_5: paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
tika-s0202t:669_6: hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā nāma.
tika-s0202t:669_7: Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārānupakāravasappavattiyā āsevanālābhena
tika-s0202t:669_8: appavipākatāya ca itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva
tika-s0202t:670_0: Tathā asakkontanti kammassa phaladānaṃ nāma upadhipayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ.
tika-s0202t:670_3: atthi bhavissati vāti evaṃ vattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
tika-s0202t:670_6: Sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā purimajavanacetanāhi laddhāsevanā ca samānā anantare
tika-s0202t:670_9: Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti.
tika-s0202t:671_1: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ atthi vipākārahābhāvassa anibbattitattā vipaccanokāsassa anupacchinnattā.
tika-s0202t:671_2: Katūpacitañhi kammaṃ sati vipaccanokāse yāva na phalaṃ deti,
tika-s0202t:671_4: “Yassa kho”ti idaṃ aniyamākāravacanaṃ bhagavatā kammasarikkhatāvasena sādhāraṇato vuttanti āha “yādisassa kho”ti.
tika-s0202t:673_0: Pāpassa pidhānaṃ nāma avipākadhammatāpādananti āha “appaṭisandhikaṃ karīyatī”ti.
tika-s0202t:674_5: yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ tesaṃ anukarontu diṭṭhānugatikaraṇaṃ āpajjantu,
tika-s0202t:674_6: attano veripuggalānampi bhagavato santike dhammassavanaṃ sammāpaṭipattiñca paccāsīsati.
tika-s0202t:675_0: Tasanti gatiṃ patthayantīti tasā bhavantarādīsu saṃsaraṇabhāvato. Tenāha “tasā vuccanti sataṇhā”ti.
tika-s0202t:677_2: Yesaṃ pana kāmāmisādīnaṃ vantattā rāgādīnaṃ cattattā kāmoghādīnaṃ tiṇṇattā tādibhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-s0202t:677_3: tesaṃ bhagavatā sabbaso vantā cattā tiṇṇā,
tika-s0202t:677_7: yehi anaññasādhāraṇehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā bhagavā tādibhāvena ukkaṃsapāramippatto taṃniddeso,
tika-s0202t:677_13: kammāni kusalādīni vipaccayanti apaccayanti etāyāti kammavipāko.
tika-s0202t:677_16: tāva ime sattā saiṇā eva aserivihārabhāvatoti āha “aṇaṇo nikkileso jāto”ti.
tika-s0202t:678_1: Bhagavatāpi hi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā,
tika-s0202t:678_4: na dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato.
tika-s0202t:678_5: Iti satthārā ananuññātattā dāyakehi ca apariccattattā “dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:678_7: Paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho.
tika-s0202t:678_9: tasmā te pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjantīti tesaṃ paribhogo dāyajjaparibhogo nāma.
tika-s0202t:678_10: Kiṃ pana te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-s0202t:678_12: Gihīhi dinnāpi te bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato anuññātesuyeva paribhogasambhavato.
tika-s0202t:679_1: tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruci paribhogasambhavato.
tika-s0202t:679_3: appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena tadubhayaṃ vivajjetvā upekkhākārena ca paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-s0202t:680_0: Vatthukāmakilesakāmehi taṇhāya pavattiākāraṃ paṭicca atthi ramaṇavohāroti āha –
tika-s0202t:680_7: Soḷasavidhakiccassa pariyositattā āha “taṃ sabbaṃ mayā kata”nti.
tika-s0202t:683_1: Pakatiniyāmenāti yathā sokuppattito pubbe iti kattabbesu asammohavasena cittaṃ pakkhandati,
tika-s0202t:683_5: Keci pana “sāmantā katipaye na kuṭumbaṃ sandhāreti.
tika-s0202t:683_8: Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ “na paṭibhātī”ti padassa “na ruccatī”ti atthamāha.
tika-s0202t:683_9: Na paṭibhātīti vā bhuñjitukāmatācittaṃ na upaṭṭhitanti attho.
tika-s0202t:683_11: Piyāyitabbato piyo jāti uppattiṭṭhānaṃ etesanti piyajātikā.
tika-s0202t:683_12: Piyo pabhuti etesanti piyappabhutikāti vattabbe, u-
tika-s0202t:684_1: saddena samānatthaṃ ajjhattikabhāvanisedhanatthaṃ “pire”ti padanti āha “amhākaṃ pare”ti.
tika-s0202t:684_2: Pireti vā “parato”ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadanti āha “cara pireti parato gacchā”ti.
tika-s0202t:685_1: Dvidhā chetvāti ettha yadi itthī tassa purisassa piyā,
tika-s0202t:686_1: Kathaṃ katheyyanti yathā bhagavā etassa brāhmaṇassa kathesi,
tika-s0202t:686_5: Palāyitvā gamanavasena aññathābhāvo mittasanthavassa samāgamassa ca aññathābhūtattā.
tika-s0202t:687_1: Hatthagamanavasena aññathābhāvo pubbe savase vattitānaṃ idāni vase avattanabhāvena.
tika-s0202t:688_1: Yasmā mukhaṃ vikkhālentā hi hatthapāde dhovitvā vikkhālenti,
tika-s0202t:688_2: tasmā “ācamitvā”ti vatvā pacchāpi tassa atthaṃ dassento “mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā”ti āha.
tika-s0202t:691_3: Bālā upārambhavatthumaññaṃ amūlakampi naṃ āropentā ugghosenti,
tika-s0202t:691_4: tasmā te anāmasitvā “viññūhī”ti idaṃ padaṃ gahetvā pañhena ñātuṃ icchitena atthena upārambhādīnaṃ upari uttaraṃ paripūretuṃ nāsakkhimhā.
tika-s0202t:691_6: Yadi hi mayā “viññūhī”ti padaṃ pakkhipitvā vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-s0202t:691_9: Idāni pana taṃ kāraṇaṃ uttaraṃ āyasmatā ānandena “viññūhī”ti evaṃ vadantena paripūritaṃ.
tika-s0202t:693_0: Tathā attho vutto bhaveyyāti pucchāsabhāgenapi attho vutto bhaveyya,
tika-s0202t:693_1: pucchantassa pana na tāva cittārādhanaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t:693_3: garukaraṇaṃ na hoti visārajjaṃ na siyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t:693_5: Evarūpo pana yathākārī tathāvādī na hoti,
tika-s0202t:693_9: Sukkapakkhepi eseva nayoti iminā “sabbesaṃyeva kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadaṃ vaṇṇetī”ti vutte yathā pucchā,
tika-s0202t:693_13: Bhagavā pana sammadeva sampāditakusalattā yathākārī tathāvādīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ byākāsī”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0202t:696_1: Medavaṇṇā uḷupavaṇṇā ca tattha tattha pāsāṇā ussannā ahesunti medāḷupanti gāmassa samaññā jātā.
tika-s0202t:696_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “medavaṇṇā pāsāṇā kirettha ussannā ahesu”nti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:697_12: Tathā hi aṅgulimālasutte “yassa kho”ti padassa “yādisassa kho”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0202t:700_1: Cakkhuṃ abandhante viyāti apāsādikatāya passantānaṃ cakkhuṃ attani abandhante viya.
tika-s0202t:702_4: Kathaṃ “dhammacetiyānīti dhammassa cittīkāravacanānī”ti vuttanti āha “tīsu hī”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:702_5: Tattha yasmā buddharatanamūlakāni sesaratanāni tassa vasena laddhabbato.
tika-s0202t:702_7: tasmā “bhagavati cittīkāre kate dhammopi katova hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:705_1: Anantarasutte vuttakaraṇīyenevāti “pāsāde vā nāṭakesu vā cittassādaṃ alabhamāno tattha tattha vicarituṃ āraddho”ti vuttakaraṇīyena.
tika-s0202t:707_3: ekacittavīthiyāpi sabbaṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti dasseti.
tika-s0202t:707_4: “Idaṃ nāma atītaṃ jānissāmī”ti aniyametvā āvajjato yaṃ kiñci atītaṃ jānāti,
tika-s0202t:707_8: Tena cittenāti “atītaṃ sabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti evaṃ pavattacittena.
tika-s0202t:708_1: Lokuttaramissakāni kathitāni bodhirājakumārasutte viya lokiyā ceva lokuttarā ca.
tika-s0202t:708_3: Paccekaṃ eva nesañca padhāniyaṅgatā daṭṭhabbā yathā “aṭṭhavimokkhā sandissanti lokuttaramissakā”ti.
tika-s0202t:708_8: Saṅkhāre parimadditvā paṭipakkhadhamme ekadesato pajahitvā ṭhitassa bhāvanānuyogo sabbena sabbaṃ aparimadditasaṅkhārassa
tika-s0202t:708_13: Ayañca viseso na kevalaṃ anariyaariyapuggalato eva,
tika-s0202t:708_14: atha kho ariyesupi sekkhādivisesatopi labbhati abhisaṅkhāravisesato abhinīhārato ca ijjhanatoti dassento “aññādisaṃ sakadāgāmino”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t:708_15: Na pāpuṇātīti yasmā puthujjano sabbathāva padhānaṃ padahanto sotāpattimaggaṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0202t:708_16: sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmimagganti heṭṭhimaṃ uparimato oḷārikaṃ,
tika-s0202t:708_17: uparimañca itarato sukhumaṃ tena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa pajahanato,
tika-s0202t:708_18: iti adhigantabbavisesena ca adhigamapaṭipadāya saṇhasukhumatā tikkhavisadatā ca viññāyatīti āha –
tika-s0202t:709_3: niyuttataṃ viniveṭhetvā samantā viparivattitvā samadhārāya chaḍḍanaṃ vā.
tika-s0202t:709_5: taṃ kāraṇanti vā taṃ kiriyaṃ taṃ adhikāraṃ.
tika-s0202t:709_14: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ missakakathāti āha “assakhaḷuṅkasuttante panā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:710_1: yathā pana dantahatthiādayotiādinā sukkapakkhe ca sādhāraṇato ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t:710_2: asādhāraṇato bhinditvā dassetuṃ “idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:711_4: Na hi sukkhavipassakatevijjachaḷabhiññānaṃ vimuttiyā nānākaraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-s0202t:713_3: Uparideve cāti uparūpari bhūmivāse deve ca,
tika-s0202t:714_2: Sā kira kathāti “natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
tika-s0202t:721_3: idha pana tadubhayampissa atthoti “mahatāti guṇamahattenapi mahatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:721_10: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādivacanato diṭṭhisīlānaṃ
tika-s0202t:721_13: “Tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti vacanato
tika-s0202t:722_1: Sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānanti ettha nighaṇḍūti vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ saddañca khaṇḍati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu.
tika-s0202t:722_6: taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato gamento pūretīti keṭubhaṃ.
tika-s0202t:722_9: Nidassanamattañcetaṃ anekesampi atthānaṃ ekasaddavacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi tassa ganthassa pavattattā.
tika-s0202t:722_14: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etehīti akkharappabhedā,
tika-s0202t:722_17: Te eva vede padaso kāyatīti padako.
tika-s0202t:722_18: Taṃ taṃ saddaṃ tadatthañca byākaroti byācikkhati etenāti byākaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t:722_20: Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ.
tika-s0202t:722_21: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
tika-s0202t:722_25: ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthaci aparikilanto avitthāyanto te ganthe sandhāreti pūretīti attho.
tika-s0202t:722_26: Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti dassento “avayo na hotī”ti vatvā tattha avayaṃ dassetuṃ “avayo…pe…
tika-s0202t:723_1: Garūti bhāriyaṃ attānaṃ tato mocetvā gamanaṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t:724_3: Tathā hi vadanti “ekasataṃ addhariyaṃ dipaññāsamattato sāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:724_9: Yathā hi buddhānaṃ lakkhaṇāni suvisuddhāni suparibyattāni paripuṇṇāni ca honti,
tika-s0202t:725_2: Dānaṃ piyavacanaṃ atthacariyā samānattatāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi.
tika-s0202t:725_6: tehi ca paraṃ sattanikāyaṃ vatteti pavattetīti cakkavattī,
tika-s0202t:725_7: parahitāvaho iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto vattanaṃ etassa atthīti cakkavattī,
tika-s0202t:725_8: appaṭihataṃ vā āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavatī,
tika-s0202t:725_9: appaṭihataṃ vā āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī,
tika-s0202t:725_10: khattiyamaṇḍalādisaññitaṃ cakkaṃ samūhaṃ attano vase vattetīti cakkavattī.
tika-s0202t:725_12: Dhammato anapetattā dhammo rañjanatthena rājāti dhammarājā.
tika-s0202t:725_17: Daḷhabhattibhāvato vā janapado thāvariyaṃ patto etthāti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
tika-s0202t:725_20: Ratinimittatāya vā cittīkatādibhāvassa ratijananaṭṭhena ekasaṅgahatāya visuṃ aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t:726_0: Imehi pana ratanehi rājā cakkavattī yaṃ yamatthaṃ paccanubhoti,
tika-s0202t:726_3: Vijite yathāsukhaṃ anuvicarati hatthiratanaṃ assaratanañca abhiruhitvā tesaṃ ānubhāvena antopātarāseyeva
tika-s0202t:726_5: Pariṇāyakaratanena vijitamanurakkhati tena tattha tattha kattabbakiccassa saṃvidhānato.
tika-s0202t:726_7: Tattha maṇiratanena yojanappamāṇe dese andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanādinā sukhamanubhavati,
tika-s0202t:726_13: Koso hi nāma sati ussāhasampattiyaṃ (uggatejassa sukumāraparakkamassa pasannamukhassa sammukhe pāpuṇāti).
tika-s0202t:726_23: kammānubhāvena sampajjanti uḷāradhanassa uḷāradhanapaṭilābhakāraṇassa ca pariccāgasampadāhetukattā.
tika-s0202t:727_4: tassa aṅgaṃ devaputto senaṅgabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vīraṅgarūpāti devaputtasadisakāyā”ti.
tika-s0202t:727_7: Vīriyamayasarīrā viyāti saviggahavīriyasadisā saviggahañce vīriyaṃ siyā,
tika-s0202t:727_9: Nanu rañño cakkavattissa paṭisenā nāma natthi,
tika-s0202t:727_12: Tena parasenā hotu vā mā vā,
tika-s0202t:727_15: Tena hi sañcoditā pathaviyaṃ sabbarājāno paccuggantvā “svāgataṃ te mahārājā”tiādiṃ vatvā attano rajjaṃ rañño cakkavattissa niyyādenti.
tika-s0202t:727_18: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tassa yathāvuttadhammassa cirataraṃ vipaccituṃ paccayabhūtaṃ cakkavattivattasamudāgataṃ
tika-s0202t:727_19: payogasampattisaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ dassetuṃ “pāṇo na hantabbotiādinā pañcasīladhammenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:727_20: Evañhi “adaṇḍena asatthenā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ samatthitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0202t:727_21: yasmā rāgādayo pāpadhammā uppajjamānā sattasantānaṃ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0202t:728_13: Tatiyacatutthehīti “ye kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā”tiādinā,
tika-s0202t:728_14: “yassa kho pana te atthāyā”tiādinā ca āgatehi tatiyacatutthehi vesārajjehi.
tika-s0202t:728_16: Yāthāvato antarāyikaniyyānikadhammāpadesena hi satthu vivaṭṭacchadabhāvo loke pākaṭo ahosi.
tika-s0202t:728_17: Purimaṃ dhammacakkhunti purimapadaṃ bhagavato dhammacakkhuṃ sādheti kilesārīnaṃ saṃsāracakkassa ca arānaṃ hatabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0202t:728_18: Dutiyaṃ padaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ sādheti sammāsambuddhasseva taṃ sambhavato.
tika-s0202t:728_20: “Sammāsambuddho”ti hi vatvā “vivaṭṭacchado”ti vacanaṃ buddhabhāvāvahameva sabbakilesappahānaṃ vibhāvetīti.
tika-s0202t:729_2: Samānayīti ñāṇena saṅkalento samānaṃ ānayi samāhari.
tika-s0202t:729_3: Na sakkoti saṃkucite iriyāpathe yebhuyyena tesaṃ dubbibhāvanato.
tika-s0202t:729_7: “Kaṅkhatī”ti padassa pubbe āsīsanatthataṃ vatvā idāni tassa saṃsayatthattameva vikappantaravasena dassento
tika-s0202t:729_11: Yasmā bhagavato kosohitaṃ sabbabuddhāveṇikaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ suvisuddhakañcanamaṇḍalasannikāsaṃ attano saṇṭhānasannivesasundaratāya
tika-s0202t:729_14: yaṃ bāhirabbhantaramalehi anupakkiliṭṭhatāya cirakālaṃ suparicitabrahmacariyādhikāratāya susaṇṭhitasaṇṭhānasampattiyā
tika-s0202t:729_19: tanumudusukumāratādīsu panassa guṇesu tassa vicāraṇā eva nāhosi.
tika-s0202t:730_4: Tañca kho buddhasantānato vinimuttaṃ rūpakamattaṃ bhagavato sarīravaṇṇasaṇṭhānāvayavaṃ iddhimayaṃ bimbakamattaṃ,
tika-s0202t:730_5: taṃ pana dassento bhagavā yathā attano buddharūpaṃ na dissati,
tika-s0202t:731_0: Kaṇṇasotānaṃ upacitatanutambalomatāya dhotarajatapanāḷikāsadisatā vuttā. Mukhapariyanteti kesante.
tika-s0202t:732_3: Na hi aññathā sabbassapi lokassa alaṅkārabhūtaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ sikkhāsaṃyamānaṃ buddhānaṃ mukhacandamaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetabbaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t:733_1: Pubbabhāgena paricchinditvāti “ettakaṃ velaṃ samāpattiyā vītināmessāmī”ti evaṃ pavattena pubbabhāgena kālaṃ paricchinditvā.
tika-s0202t:733_2: Paccayadāyakesu anurodhavasena parisaṃ ussādento vā paggaṇhanto,
tika-s0202t:734_2: Bhoto gotamassa guṇaṃ saviggahaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ atisambādhaṃ vitthārena sandhāretuṃ appahontato.
tika-s0202t:735_1: Ṭhānagamanādīsu bhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu samaṃpatiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti suppatiṭṭhitapādo.
tika-s0202t:735_2: Taṃ pana bhagavato suppatiṭṭhitapādataṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:735_10: Ekappahāreneva sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmito uṭṭhahatīti yojanā.
tika-s0202t:736_0: Tatrāti tāya suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya anupubbaninnāva acchariyabbhutaṃ idaṃ vuccamānaṃ nissandaphalaṃ.
tika-s0202t:736_1: Vuttamevatthaṃ satthu tidivagamanena supākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “tathā hī”tiādiṃ vatvā “na hī”tiādinā taṃ samattheti.
tika-s0202t:736_3: Tathā hi vakkhati “antamaso cakkavattirañño parisaṃ upādāya sabbopi cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāro”ti.
tika-s0202t:736_4: Yugandharapabbatassa tāvatiṃsabhavanassa ca pakatipadanikkhepaṭṭhānupasaṅkamane neva buddhānaṃ,
tika-s0202t:736_6: atha kho buddhānaṃ lakkhaṇānubhāvoti imamatthaṃ nidassitaṃ.
tika-s0202t:736_8: dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ ānubhāvenāti idampi lakkhaṇanibbattakammavisesakittanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:739_0: Āyatapaṇhīti idaṃ aññesaṃ paṇhito dīghataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t:739_2: Yathā pana paṇhilakkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0202t:742_4: Paṭivijjhitvāti taṃtaṃpabbānaṃ samānadesatāya aṅgulīnaṃ pasāritakāle aññamaññaṃ vijjhitāni viya phusitvā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0202t:743_4: teneva gacchantānaṃ tesaṃ heṭṭhā pādatalāni dissanti.
tika-s0202t:744_0: Yasmā eṇīmigassa samantato ekasadisamaṃsā anukkamena uddhaṃ thūlā jaṅghā honti,
tika-s0202t:745_3: Khujjā vā honti heṭṭhimakāyato uparimakāyassa rassatāya.
tika-s0202t:745_5: Etena ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ cakkavattinañca itare sattā khujjā vāmanā cāti dasseti.
tika-s0202t:746_0: Ohitanti samohitaṃ antogadhaṃ. Tathābhūtaṃ pana taṃ tena channaṃ hotīti āha “paṭicchanna”nti.
tika-s0202t:747_2: Sarīrapariyāyo idha vaṇṇasaddoti adhippāyena paṭhamavikappaṃ vatvā tathārūpāya pana ruḷhiyā abhāvaṃ manasi
tika-s0202t:747_3: katvā vaṇṇadhātupariyāyameva vaṇṇasaddaṃ gahetvā dutiyavikappo vutto.
tika-s0202t:750_0: Brahmuno sarīraṃ purato vā pacchato vā anonamitvā ujukameva uggatanti āha “brahmā viya ujugatto”ti.
tika-s0202t:750_1: Passavaṅkāti dakkhiṇapassena vā vāmapassena vā vaṅkā.
tika-s0202t:752_1: paripuṇṇāvayavatāya sīhapubbaddhaṃ viya sakalo kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo.
tika-s0202t:754_0: Nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo viya parimaṇḍalo nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo ekassa parimaṇḍalasaddassa lopaṃ katvā.
tika-s0202t:754_3: Parimaṇḍalasaddasannidhānena vā parimaṇḍalova nigrodho gayhatīti parimaṇḍalasaddassa lopena vināpi ayamattho
tika-s0202t:756_0: Rasaggasaggīti madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ gasanti anto pavesantīti rasaggasā,
tika-s0202t:757_3: Tattha yasmā buddhānaṃ rūpakāyassa dhammakāyassa ca upamā nāma nihīnupamāva,
tika-s0202t:760_1: te attano sarasampattiyā pakatiṃ jahāpetvā avase karonto attano vase vatteti,
tika-s0202t:760_4: Teneva nīhārena punappunaṃ pavattantaṃ avijahitvā vikkhambhitakilesā therānaṃ santike laddhadhammassavanasappāyā
tika-s0202t:760_7: Sattasatamattena orodhajanena saddhiṃ padasāva therānaṃ santikaṃ upagatattā “sattahi jaṅghāsatehi saddhi”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:761_2: na nette nīlavaṇṇasseva adhikabhāvatoti āha “na sakalanīlanettovā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:764_0: Dve atthavase paṭicca vuttanti yasmā buddhā cakkavattino ca paripuṇṇanalāṭatāya paripuṇṇasīsabimbatāya ca “uṇhīsasīsā”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0202t:764_1: tasmā te dve atthavase paṭicca “uṇhīsasīso”ti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:764_2: Idāni taṃ atthadvayaṃ bhagavati suppatiṭṭhitanti dassetuṃ “tathāgatassahī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:764_3: Saṇhatamatāya suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya ca rañño baddhauṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocati.
tika-s0202t:764_11: Uṇhīsaṃ viyāti chekena sippinā viracitauṇhīsamaṇḍalaṃ viya.
tika-s0202t:765_0: Kammanti yena yena kammena yaṃ yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattaṃ,
tika-s0202t:765_5: Imāni kammādīnīti imāni anantaraṃ vuttāni kammakammasarikkhakādīni dassetvā taṃ sarūpato vibhāvetvā kathetabbāni saṃvaṇṇakena.
tika-s0202t:766_0: Ratanavicittasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ tasmiṃ kāle manussaloke natthīti vuttaṃ “devanagare”ti.
tika-s0202t:766_1: Sabbaso supupphitasālarukkho asādhāraṇasobho manussūpacāre na labbhatīti āha “selantaramhī”ti.
tika-s0202t:767_1: Satatapāṭihāriyanti satataṃ carimabhave sabbakālaṃ lakkhaṇanibbattakakammānubhāvahetukaṃ buddhāveṇikaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-s0202t:767_2: Buddhānaṃ atidūre pādaṃ nikkhipitukāmānampi nātidūre eva nikkhipanaṃ hotīti “na atidūre ṭhapessāmīti uddharatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:767_4: tādisena pādena anekayojane ṭhapessāmīti uddharaṇampi hotiyeva.
tika-s0202t:767_6: Evaṃ satīti evaṃ dakkhiṇapādavāmapādānaṃ yathādhippetapatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne sati.
tika-s0202t:767_10: iti nesaṃ uddharaṇapatiṭṭhānānaṃ samānato aññamaññabhāvena anūnānadhikatāya vuttaṃ “dakkhiṇapādakiccaṃ vāmapādena niyamitaṃ,
tika-s0202t:768_3: Okāsaṃ na labhatīti padanikkhepaṭṭhānaṃ na labhati.
tika-s0202t:768_7: tena rukkhasākhaṃ chindato purisassa yathā pacchābhāgena pādānaṃ osakkanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0202t:768_8: evaṃ bhagavato pādā na osakkantīti āha “rukkhasākhāchedana…pe…
tika-s0202t:768_10: Obaddhānābaddhaṭṭhānehi pādaṃ koṭṭento viyāti ābaddhaṭṭhānena anābaddhaṭṭhānena ca pādakhaṇḍaṃ koṭṭetvā thaddhaṃ karonto viya.
tika-s0202t:768_11: Na ito cito ca cāletīti aparāparaṃ na cāleti.
tika-s0202t:768_12: Ussaṅkhapādatāya sukheneva pādānaṃ parivattanato nābhito paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo na iñjatīti heṭṭhimakāyova iñjati.
tika-s0202t:768_21: Nāgāpalokitavasenāti nāgassa apalokanamiva sakalakāyeneva parivattetvā apalokanavasena.
tika-s0202t:769_1: Anāvaraṇavāro pana kāye patiṭṭhitarūpadassanampi anāvaraṇamevāti dassanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-s0202t:770_0: Hatthehi gahetvāti ubhohi hatthehi ubhosu kaṭippadesesu pariggahetvā.
tika-s0202t:770_2: Orimaṃ aṅgaṃ nissāya nisinnoti pallaṅkamābhujitvā ukkuṭikanisajjāya uparimakāyaṃ heṭṭhimakāye patiṭṭhapentoyeva
tika-s0202t:770_7: Olambakaṃ dhārento viyāti olambakasuttaṃ otārento viya.
tika-s0202t:770_9: Sarīrassa garukabhāvahetūnaṃ dūrato samupāyitabhāvena sallahukabhāvato tūlapicuṃ ṭhapento viya.
tika-s0202t:771_4: taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato natthīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “na chambhatī”tiādi vuttanti āha “na chambhatī”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:772_2: Baddhaṃ katvāti hatthagatamattikaṃ viya attano vase avattantaṃ katvā.
tika-s0202t:773_4: ālopena byañjanaatināmananti imesu pana dvīsu paṭhamameva asāruppatāya aniṭṭhaṃ vajjetabbanti pāḷiyaṃ paṭikkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:773_5: Sabbatthevāti sabbasmiṃ āharitabbavatthusmiṃ supaṇītabhāvena raso pākaṭo hoti ñāṇena pariññātattā.
tika-s0202t:774_1: Vuttametanti “visuddhimagge vinicchayo āgato”ti sabbāsavasutte saṃvaṇṇayantena vuttametaṃ,
tika-s0202t:774_2: tasmā na ettha taṃ vattabbanti adhippāyo,
tika-s0202t:774_3: tasmā yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vinicchaye visesavādo icchitabbo.
tika-s0202t:774_6: Vinivattitvāti patte sabbaṃ āmisagataṃ saddhiṃ bhattena vinivattitvā gacchati.
tika-s0202t:775_2: Ubhayampi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā pāḷiyaṃ “na ca anumodanassa kālamatināmetī”ti vuttanti dassento “yo hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t:776_5: Ubhato ukkhipitvāti dakkhiṇato vāmatoti ubhosu passesu uttarāsaṅgaṃ ukkhipitvā.
tika-s0202t:777_2: Yasmā amuttavādino vacanaṃ avissaṭṭhatāya na siniyhati,
tika-s0202t:777_4: Viññeyyoti suparibyattatāya akkharato ca byañjanato ca viññātuṃ sakkuṇeyyo.
tika-s0202t:777_7: Byañjanavaseneva cettha viññeyyatā veditabbā ghosassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0202t:777_12: Bhagavato hi saddo uppattiṭṭhānakatāsañcitattā sahitākāreneva āpāthamāgacchati,
tika-s0202t:777_16: evaṃ gambhīraṭṭhānasambhavato saddassa gambhīrasamaññāti āha “gambhīroti gambhīrasamuṭṭhito”ti.
tika-s0202t:777_18: Svāyaṃ viseso gambhīrabhāvasiddhoti āha “gambhīrattāyeva cesa ninnādī”ti.
tika-s0202t:777_20: Akāraṇā mā nassīti buddhānubhāvena viya sarassa parisapariyantatā vuttā,
tika-s0202t:777_21: dhammatāvaseneva pana sā veditabbā tassa mūlakāraṇassa tathā avaṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0202t:780_0: 391. Sahasāva okāsakaraṇena uccakulīnatā dīpitā hotīti āha “vegena uṭṭhāya dvidhā bhijjitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:782_3: pavuccatī”ti iminā pubbenivāsassa viditakāraṇaṃ vuttanti āha “tassa pubbenivāso pākaṭo”ti.
tika-s0202t:782_6: abhiññā vosito”ti ca vuttattā munīti asekkhamuni idhādhippetoti āha “arahattañāṇamoneyyena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0202t:783_6: Tādisoti yādiso “pāragū sabbadhammāna”nti padadvayena vutto, tādiso.
tika-s0202t:783_7: Chahi ākārehīti pajānanādīhi yathāvuttehi chahi ākārehi.
tika-s0202t:784_0: Kāmañcettha dve eva pucchāgāthā dve ca vissajjanāgāthā,
tika-s0202t:784_1: pucchāpaṭipāṭiyā pana asaṅkarato ca vissajjanaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0202t:784_5: Pāpadhammānanti chattiṃsapāpadhammānaṃ sotthānaṃ maggaṃ pāpanena nissesato sodhitattā.
tika-s0202t:785_1: Dhammo nāma arahattamaggo kusaladhammesu ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā ukkaṭṭhaniddesena.
tika-s0202t:785_3: Yo satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjati,
tika-s0202t:785_5: Yo pana paṭipajjanto ca dandhābhiññatāya kammaṭṭhānasodhanatthaṃ antarantarā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā anekavāraṃ kathāpeti,
tika-s0202t:785_6: so ettāvatā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ tathāgataṃ viheṭhetīti na vattabbo.
tika-s0202t:785_7: Na hi bhagavato dhammadesanāya parissamo atthi,
tika-s0202t:785_9: “saccadhammassa anudhamma”nti vattabbe vuttameva byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ “na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:785_10: Tattha parinibbāyīti parakāle cettha parinibbānampi saṅgayhati,
tika-s0202t:785_11: taṃ pana imasmiṃ gahitameva hotīti āha “desanāya arahatteneva kūṭaṃ gahita”nti.
tika-s0202t:788_7: Susaṅkhatanti sappimadhusakkarādīhi ceva maricasiṅgīverādīhi ca suṭṭhu abhisaṅkhataṃ.
tika-s0202t:789_1: yo nimantiyamānopi na sādiyatīti upanimantiyamānassa paṭikkhepe titthiyānaṃ pasannabhāvatoti.
tika-s0202t:790_4: Pajjati nikkhipati etthāti vā padaṃ pakatiyā pādanikkhipaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0202t:791_10: Suvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇoti jātihiṅgulakena madditvā silānighaṃseneva parikammaṃ katvā ṭhapitaghanasuvaṇṇarūpavaṇṇo.
tika-s0202t:792_3: “kalyāṇadassano bhikkhu kañcanābhattaco”ti puna vuttanti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “uttaragāthāyapi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0202t:792_4: Sātisayaṃ uttamavaṇṇe vaṇṇetvā uttamavaṇṇinoti padena santaṃ pakāsetīti āha “uttamavaṇṇasampannassā”ti.
tika-s0202t:794_2: Dhammarājā anuttaroti ettha vuttaanuttarabhāvaṃ “yāvatā hī”tiādinā pākaṭataraṃ katvā dhammarājabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “svāha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:795_0: Tathāgatena jātoti tathāgatena hetunā ariyāya jātiyā jāto.
tika-s0202t:795_3: saddassa vasena tathāgatanti ca upayogavacanameva hoti,
tika-s0202t:795_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ kokālikaṃ ārabbha “purisantakali avajāto”ti.
tika-s0202t:795_9: Putto nāma na hoti tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ aṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0202t:796_4: sabbe ca pana satta dhammā abhiññeyyāti vijjāya abhiññeyyabhāvo vutto.
tika-s0202t:796_5: Iminā vā nayena sabbesampi abhiññeyyabhāvo vutto evāti veditabbo.
tika-s0202t:796_6: Phalena vinā hetubhāvasseva abhāvato hetuvacanena phalasiddhi,
tika-s0202t:796_8: Dukkhassa nibbattanena taṇhāya samudayabhāvoti imamatthaṃ saṅgahitameva atthato āpannattā.
tika-s0202t:796_9: Yuttahetunāti yuttiyuttena hetunā buddhabhāvaṃ sādheti saccavinimuttassa bujjhitabbassa abhāvato saccasambodhaneneva ca tassa anavasesato buddhattā.
tika-s0202t:796_14: Kiṃ pana bhagavā sayameva attano sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ ārocetīti?
tika-s0202t:796_17: sabbābhibhū sabbavidūhamasmī”tiādīni suttapadāni idameva ca suttapadaṃ etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0202t:797_3: Brahmaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ pattoti brahmabhūto.
tika-s0202t:798_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
tika-s0202t:799_0: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
tika-s0202t:800_0: Thinamiddhaṃ tepañcamaṃ thinamiddhaṃ te, chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati;
tika-s0202t:801_0: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo.
tika-s0202t:802_0: Lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso;
tika-s0202t:803_0: Yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānati;
tika-s0202t:805_1: Vase vattetvāti samucchindanena anuppādatāpādanena vase vattetvā.
tika-s0202t:806_1: tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbaṃ hitvā asammohato paccavekkhaṇāñāṇeneva sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:806_5: evaṃ idaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhikaṃ.
tika-s0202t:806_9: Sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko yathā vatthayugaṃ arahatīti vatthayugiko.
tika-s0202t:806_10: Sandiṭṭhikaṃ phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālaṃ,
tika-s0202t:806_13: attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phalaṃ detīti attho.
tika-s0202t:806_14: Atha vā attano phalappadāne pakaṭṭho kālo patto assāti kāliko,
tika-s0202t:807_1: “Mahāyaññaṃ pavattayī”tiādīsu kevalaṃ dānadhammādīsu yaññapariyāyasambhavato “brāhmaṇānaṃ yaññābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:807_2: Brāhmaṇā hi “aggimukhā devā”ti aggijuhanapubbakaṃ yaññaṃ vidahanti.
tika-s0202t:807_4: Sva?” Iti sāvittī pubbakattā mukhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ.
tika-s0202t:807_5: “Mukhamiva mukha”ntiādīsu viya idhāpi padhānapariyāyo mukhasaddoti dassento “manussānaṃ seṭṭhato rājā ‘mukha’nti vutto”ti āha.
tika-s0202t:807_6: Ādhāratoti ogāhantīnaṃ nadīnaṃ ādhārabhāvato paṭisaraṇato gantabbaṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0202t:807_10: Tapantānanti dīpasikhā aggijālā asanivicakkanti evamādīnaṃ vijjalantānaṃ.
tika-s0202t:808_0: Dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhu paññācakkhu buddhacakkhu samantacakkhūti imehi pañcahi cakkhūhi.
tika-s0202t:808_8: Āvuttivasena vā te saraṇassāti ettha attho vibhāvetabbo –
tika-s0202t:808_9: tuyhaṃ saraṇabhūtassa ca itarasaraṇassa ca ānubhāvoti.
tika-s0202t:811_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana verajjasseva vasena nānappakāratā vuttā.
tika-s0202t:811_9: Catuvaṇṇasādhāraṇanti khattiyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsārasuddhipāpatassanaṃ.
tika-s0202t:812_2: tasmā brāhmaṇānaṃ pabbajjāvidhānaṃ sikkhantena bhotā “brāhmaṇāva sujjhanti,
tika-s0202t:812_3: no abrāhmaṇā”ti ayaṃ vidhi sahetuko saupādāno sakkaccaṃ uggahito,
tika-s0202t:813_1: Laddhibhindanatthanti “brāhmaṇāva brahmuno puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā”ti evaṃ pavattaladdhiyā viniveṭhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0202t:813_2: Puttapaṭilābhatthāyāti “evaṃ mayaṃ pettikaṃ iṇadhāraṃ sodheyyāmā”ti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā puttapaṭilābhatthāya.
tika-s0202t:813_5: Saccavacanaṃ siyāti “brahmuno puttā”tiādivacanaṃ saccaṃ yadi siyā brāhmaṇīnaṃ…pe… bhaveyya,
tika-s0202t:813_8: Assalāyanoviññū jātiko “nirakkhepaṃ samaṇena gotamena vutta”nti jānantopi sahagatānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0202t:814_1: Idāni brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇoti vādaṃ bhindituṃ “sutaṃ te yonakakambojesū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0202t:814_4: atha kasmā yonakakambojādijanapadesu brāhmaṇānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvo natthi?
tika-s0202t:814_7: Tesu hi janapadesu janā ekajjhaṃ sannipatitvā sammantayitvā katikaṃ akaṃsu,
tika-s0202t:814_8: dāsaṃ sāmikaṃ katvā itare sabbe taṃ pūjetvā tassa vase vattanti,
tika-s0202t:814_9: yo tesaṃ ayyo hoti itare sabbe tassa dāsā honti,
tika-s0202t:814_10: te katipayasaṃvaccharātikkamena tassa kiñci dosaṃ disvā taṃ tato ṭhānato apanetvā aññaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-s0202t:814_11: iti so ayyo hutvā dāso hoti,
tika-s0202t:814_13: evaṃ tāva keci “ayyo hutvā dāso hoti,
tika-s0202t:814_14: dāso hutvā ayyo hotī”ti ettha atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0202t:814_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana purimavaseneva tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “brāhmaṇo sabhariyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:814_16: Vayappatte putte asatīti idaṃ vakkhamānassa dārakassa dāyajjasāmikabhāvassa tāva dassanaṃ.
tika-s0202t:814_17: Mātito suddhoti ettha yo mātito suddhattā ayyo,
tika-s0202t:814_19: so eva pitito asuddhattā dāso hutvā mātito ayyo hotīti jātiṃ sambhedeti.
tika-s0202t:814_20: Sova sabbena sabbaṃ hotīti na sakkā vattunti apare.
tika-s0202t:814_21: Ko thāmoti mahante lokasannivāse anamatagge atīte kāle itthīnaṃ vā citte anavaṭṭhite dāsā dāsā eva honti,
tika-s0202t:814_22: ayyā ayyā eva hontīti ettha ko ekantiko sahetuko avassayo,
tika-s0202t:815_0: 404. Sukkacchedakavādo nāmāti “brāhmaṇova sukko vaṇṇo”ti evaṃ vutto sukkacchedakavāro nāma.
tika-s0202t:816_1: Sabbasmiṃ aggikiccaṃ karonteti etena yathā yato kutoci nissayato uppanno aggiupādānasampanno aggikiccaṃ karoti,
tika-s0202t:816_2: evaṃ yasmiṃ kasmiñci dāsakule jāto upanissayasampanno sammāpaṭipajjamāno saṃsārato sujjhati evāti dasseti.
tika-s0202t:817_3: brāhmaṇakumārena khattiyakaññāya uppannaputtoti etesaṃ dvinnaṃ māṇavakānaṃ.
tika-s0202t:818_1: Tumheti jātisāmaññato māṇavaṃ brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhanto āha.
tika-s0202t:818_3: tesaṃ brāhmaṇīsīnaṃ asāmatthiyadassanena jātiyā appamāṇataṃ vibhāvetuṃ gāmadārakavesena upagacchi.
tika-s0202t:819_5: Tattha kira kusalo yaṃ kiñci āhārūpagapaṇṇapupphaphalabījaṃ antamaso elālukampi gahetvā bhesajjehi yojetvā
tika-s0202t:819_6: pacanto sappimadhuphāṇitehi samānarasaṃ katvā sampādetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0202t:819_8: tena ñātaṃ tvaṃ dabbigahaṇasippamattampi na jānāsīti sambandho.
tika-s0202t:822_1: Khemiyā nāma rañño deviyā ropitattā taṃ ambavanaṃ khemiyambavananti vuccatīti vadanti.
tika-s0202t:822_2: Dhammikoti dhammayutto sabbasova adhammaṃ pahāya dhamme ṭhito.
tika-s0202t:822_7: tehi tehi paribbājakehi anuṭṭhātabbo paṭipattidhammasaṅkhāto sabhāvo.
tika-s0202t:822_8: Dhammova pamāṇanti etena mayaṃ ahirimanā cittassa yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ kathema,
tika-s0202t:822_13: tassa tumhehi tumhehi bahunā nānāsandassanādi kammena idha bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0202t:823_9: addhā panāyasmā udeno yāthāvato dhammikaṃ paribbajaṃ me ācikkhatīti.
tika-s0202t:824_2: tasmā yaṃ kiñci katvā attā posetabbo rakkhitabboti lokāyatanissito nītimaggo ghoṭamukhakanto,
tika-s0202t:824_4: Sagge nibbatto nāma natthi akattabbameva karaṇato.
tika-s0202t:824_5: Devalokapariyāpannadhanaṃ manussānaṃ upakappapuññābhāvato pubbe attanā nihitadhanaṃ “asuke cā”ti ācikkhitvā gato.
tika-s0202t:827_7: Idāni tesaṃ atthavisesabhāvitaṃ dassento “abhibhavitvā vā āvasatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t:827_10: “tassa anuppayogattāva sesapadesū”ti. Upa- anu- adhi- iti- evaṃ-
tika-s0202t:827_11: pubbake vasanakiriyayāṭṭhāne upayogavacanameva pāpuṇātīti saddavidū icchantīti āha “lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato pariyesitabba”nti.
tika-s0202t:827_12: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “upasaggavasena panettha bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-s0202t:827_13: Ussadatā nāmettha bahulatāti taṃ bahulataṃ dassetuṃ “bahujana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:828_1: Rañño dāyabhūtanti kulaparamparāya bhoggabhāvena raññā laddhadāyabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0202t:828_3: Rājanīhārena paribhuñjitabbato uddhaṃ paribhogalābhassa seṭṭhadeyyatā nāma natthīti āha –
tika-s0202t:829_3: tassa pucchitassa yāthāvato kathanasamattho pucchitapañhabyākaraṇasamattho.Kulāpadesādinā mahatī mattā etassāti mahāmatto.
tika-s0202t:830_2: “Ubhato sujāto”ti ettake vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātatā viññāyeyya,
tika-s0202t:830_3: sujātasaddo ca “sujāto cārudassano”tiādīsu ārohapariṇāhasampattipariyāyoti jātivaseneva sujātataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:830_5: idha panassa orasaputtavaseneva icchīyatīti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhagahaṇīko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:830_9: tasmā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t:830_10: Yugasaddo cettha ekasesanayena daṭṭhabbo “yugo ca yugo ca yugā”ti.
tika-s0202t:830_11: Evañhi tattha tattha dvinnaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t:830_17: Jātivādenāti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ “kena kāraṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:830_19: pitāmahayugāti etena brāhmaṇassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikabhāvakittanato.
tika-s0202t:830_23: Ayuttasaṃsaggampi hi paṭicca sattā akkosaṃ labhanti.
tika-s0202t:831_1: Sā panassa issaratā vibhavasampattipaccayā pākaṭā jātāti aḍḍhatāpariyāyabhāvena vadanto “aḍḍhoti issaro”ti āha.
tika-s0202t:832_7: so ca saṇṭhānamukhena gayhatīti “paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti paramāya…pe…
tika-s0202t:832_9: Sabbavaṇṇesu suvaṇṇavaṇṇova uttamoti vuttaṃ “seṭṭhena suvaṇṇavaṇṇena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0202t:832_10: Tathā hi buddhā cakkavattino ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva honti.
tika-s0202t:832_12: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāyāha “mahābrahmuno sarīrasadisena sarīrena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0202t:832_14: Akhuddāvakāso dassanāyāti ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā avayavapāripūriyā ca dassanāya okāso na khuddako.
tika-s0202t:833_1: taṃ panassa rattaññutāya vuddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthīti vuddhasīlī,
tika-s0202t:833_2: tena ca sabbadā samāyogato vuḍḍhasīlena samannāgato.
tika-s0202t:833_3: Pañcasīlamattameva sandhāya vadanti tato paraṃ sīlassa tattha abhāvato tesañca ajānanato.
tika-s0202t:834_0: Ṭhānakaraṇasampattiyā sikkhāsampattiyā ca katthacipi anūnatāya parimaṇḍalapadāni byañjanāni akkharāni etissāti parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā.
tika-s0202t:834_1: Atha vā pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, nāmādi,
tika-s0202t:834_9: Pūreti ca purimasmiṃ atthe ādhāre bhummaṃ,
tika-s0202t:834_18: Ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvāti iminā cassa vācāya atthapāripūriṃ vadanti.
tika-s0202t:835_2: Na hi buddhānaṃ guṇehi sabbathā sadisā kecipi guṇā aññesu labbhanti.
tika-s0202t:836_1: Sīhaseyyaṃ kappesīti yathā rāhu asurindo āyāmato vitthārato ubbedhato ca bhagavato rūpakāyassa paricchedaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0202t:837_3: Katthaci caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni katthaci aparimāṇāpi devamanussā yasmā catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyyā aparimeyyā maggaphalāmataṃ pivanti.
tika-s0202t:838_1: na vā pāpaṃ purato karotītipi apāpapurekkhāroti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apāpe nava lokuttaradhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:839_0: Tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadāti ettha rajjaṃ raṭṭhaṃ rājanti rājāno etenāti katvā.
tika-s0202t:839_1: Tadekadesabhūtā padesā pana janapado janā pajjanti ettha sukhajīvikaṃ pāpuṇantīti katvā.
tika-s0202t:839_3: Bhagavā vissajjeti tesaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ cintetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t:840_2: Tathābhūto ca tattha pesitā hotīti vuttaṃ “pavesetī”ti.
tika-s0202t:841_1: Sudde bahi katvā raho sāsitabbaṭṭhena mantā eva taṃtaṃatthapaṭipattihetutāya padanti mantapadaṃ vedaṃ.
tika-s0202t:841_3: Evaṃ kirāti paramparabhāvena ābhatanti ācariyaparamparāya ābhataṃ.
tika-s0202t:841_5: Sāvittiādīhi chandabandhehi vaggabandhehi cāti gāyattīādīhi ajjhāyānuvākādīhi chandabandhehi ca vaggabandhehi ca.
tika-s0202t:841_13: Dibbena cakkhunā oloketvāti dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍena yathākammūpagañāṇena sattānaṃ kammassakataṃ,
tika-s0202t:841_14: paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena dibbacakkhusadisena pubbenivāsañāṇena atītakappe brāhmaṇānaṃ mantajjhenavidhiñca oloketvā.
tika-s0202t:841_15: Pāvacanena saha saṃsandetvāti kassapasammāsambuddhassa yaṃ vacanaṃ vaṭṭasannissitaṃ,
tika-s0202t:841_17: Na hi tesaṃ vivaṭṭasannissito attho paccakkho hoti.
tika-s0202t:841_20: Pakkhipitvāti aṭṭhakādīhi ganthitamantapadesu kilesasannissitapadānaṃ tattha tattha pade pakkhipanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0202t:841_21: Viruddhe akaṃsūti brāhmaṇadhammikasuttādīsu āgatanayeneva saṃkilesikatthadīpanato paccanīkabhūte akaṃsu.
tika-s0202t:842_4: Purimassāti maṇḍalākārena ṭhitāya andhaveṇiyā sabbapurimassa hatthena sabbapacchimassa kacchaṃ gaṇhāpetvā.
tika-s0202t:842_6: Cakkhussa anāgatabhavaṃ ñatvā yathāakkantaṭṭhāneyeva anupatitvā akkamanaṃva sallakkhetvā “kahaṃ cakkhumā kahaṃ maggo”ti pariveditvā.
tika-s0202t:843_0: Pāḷiāgatesu dvīsūti saddhā anussavoti imesu dvīsu.
tika-s0202t:843_7: Ekaṃseneva niṭṭhaṃ gantuṃ nālaṃ anekantikattā saddhādiggāhassa.
tika-s0202t:843_8: Upari pucchāya maggaṃ vivaritvā ṭhapesi saccānurakkhāya ñātukāmatāya uppāditattā.
tika-s0202t:843_11: niṭṭhaṃ gantu”nti vutte saccānurakkhaṇaṃ ñātukāmo māṇavo “kittāvatā”tiādinā pucchissati,
tika-s0202t:843_12: tassa taṃ vissajjetvā saccānubodhe pucchāya avasaraṃ datvā tassa upanissaye upakāradhamme kathessāmīti.
tika-s0202t:844_5: Lubbhantīti lobhanīyā yathā “apāyagamanīyā”ti āha “lobhanīyesu dhammesūti lobhadhammesū”ti.
tika-s0202t:845_8: Olokananti evametanti yathāsabhāvato paññācakkhunā daṭṭhabbataṃ khamanti,
tika-s0202t:845_9: tañca mahantassa maṇino pajjalantassa viya āvikatvā atthassa citte upaṭṭhānanti āha “idhā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:845_11: Vāyamatītiādito catunnampi vīriyānaṃ vasena vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti.
tika-s0202t:845_12: Maggapadhānaṃ padahatīti maggāvahaṃ maggapariyāpannañca sammappadhānaṃ padahati,
tika-s0202t:846_7: Evañhi sati heṭṭhā vuttā saddhāpaṭilābhādayo dvādasa dhammā saccānuppattiyā upakārā honti,
tika-s0202t:846_10: Satipi kusalavipākādibhāvena nānatte vatthārammaṇabhūmikiccādivasena pana sadisāti upāyatova maggadhammā
tika-s0202t:846_11: āsevitā bahulīkatā phalabhūtāti vattabbataṃ arahatīti taṃsadise tabbohāraṃ katvā “tesaṃ maggasampayuttadhammāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:846_17: Sā hi vuṭṭhānagāminibhūtā maggappadhānassa bahukārā tassa abhāve maggappadhānasseva abhāvato,
tika-s0202t:846_18: evaṃ ussāho tulanāya chando ussāhassa bahukārotiādinā heṭṭhimassa uparimūpakārataṃ suviññeyyamevāti āha –
tika-s0202t:849_2: Laggāpeyyunti nhārunā vā vākena vā bandhitvā purisassa hatthe vā vasanagehe vā olambanavasena bandheyyuṃ.
tika-s0202t:849_4: Tassa nikkhamanatthanti taṃ mūlaṃ satthikehi nittharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0202t:849_5: Pāpaṃ assāti paricarantassa pāricariyāya ahitaṃva assa.
tika-s0202t:849_8: idha upadhivipattisampattiyo pāpiyādipadehi vuttāti adhippāyo. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t:849_13: “Vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”tiādīsu viya vaṇṇasaddo idha pasaṃsāpariyāyoti āha “vessopi hi uḷāravaṇṇo hotī”ti.
tika-s0202t:850_1: “Niravo padasaddo soḷāragottassa akiṇṇamattikāpatto tiṭṭheyya asaṅgacārī”ti vuttattā bhikkhā caritabbāva,
tika-s0202t:850_8: Vividhaṃ bhāraṃ ābhañjanti olambanti etthāti byābhaṅgī, kājaṃ.
tika-s0202t:851_1: Anussaratoti anussaraṇahetu kulavaṃsānussaraṇakkhaṇe khattiyotiādinā saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0202t:851_4: Uccanīcattajānanatthañca kulavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hotīti khattiyādikulakammunā tesaṃ catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ sandhanaṃ jīvikaṃ paññapenti brāhmaṇā,
tika-s0202t:851_5: tathāgato pana lokuttaradhammameva purisassa sandhanaṃ paññapeti tena sattassa lokaggabhāvasiddhito.
tika-s0202t:854_2: Rājagahanagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge pabbatassa samīpe ṭhito janapado dakkhiṇāgiri.
tika-s0202t:854_4: Tassa kira dvārasamīpe taṇḍulavāṇijā taṇḍulapasibbake vivaritvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā nisīdanti,
tika-s0202t:854_6: Sabbameva sassaṃ gaṇhātīti daliddakassakānaṃ divasaparibbayamattameva vissajjetvā sabbameva āyato nipphannaṃ dhaññaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0202t:855_1: Iminā nayenāti dāsakammakarassa nivāsanabhattavettanānuppadānena maṅgaladivasesu dhanavatthālaṅkārānuppadānādinā ca posetabbo.
tika-s0202t:855_6: Sammā dadantesupi asajjanato natthi etesaṃ tithīti atithi,
tika-s0202t:855_10: dakkhiṇeyyesu kālena kālaṃ dānaṃ datvā tesaṃ uddisanaṃ pubbapetakaraṇīyaṃ,
tika-s0202t:855_12: Gandhapupphavilepanajālābhattehi kālena kālaṃ devatānaṃ pūjā devatākaraṇīyaṃ,
tika-s0202t:855_15: Ayampi kāyoti attano kāyaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0202t:856_3: Adhammacārī eva visamacārī kāyavisamādicaraṇatoti visamacārīpadassa attho visuṃ na vutto.
tika-s0202t:857_12: Catusaccavinimuttanti niddhāretvā vibhajitvā vuccamānehi saccehi vimuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:857_13: Atthato pana tato pubbepi saccavimuttaṃ kathaṃ na kathesiyeva saccavimuttassa niyyānassa abhāvato.
tika-s0202t:860_1: Jātiṃ sodhetukāmā hontīti sahavāsīnaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kiriyā parādhena vā asāruppattena vā jātiyā upakkilesaṃ āsaṅkāya taṃ sodhetukāmā honti.
tika-s0202t:860_2: Mante sodhetukāmā hontīti mantavacane ācariyamaticodanāya aññena vākyena kenaci kāraṇena saṃsaye uppanne taṃ sodhetukāmā honti.
tika-s0202t:860_4: aññatthevā antarāsaddoti tassa aññā kathāti vacanaṃ avagantabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:860_7: Sampannasīlattā vā tehi samannāgato eva hotīti āha “sīlavāti guṇavā”ti.
tika-s0202t:861_2: na dāni tumhehi kiñci kattabbaṃ atthīti attho.
tika-s0202t:862_2: Tayo vede aṇanti ajjhayantīti brāhmaṇā, tesaṃ.
tika-s0202t:862_4: taṃ atthato byañjanato ca kevalino adhiyino appapayogena.
tika-s0202t:862_5: Niṭṭhāgatamhāti nipphattiṃ gatā amhā tevijjāya sakasamayassa kathane.
tika-s0202t:864_1: Sukkapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya hi cando vaḍḍhatīti vuccati,
tika-s0202t:865_0: Atthadassanenāti vivaraṇena dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena lokassa cakkhu hutvā samuppannaṃ.
tika-s0202t:866_2: “kiṃ jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti udāhu bhavati kammunā”ti ayaṃ brāhmaṇavicāro tāva tiṭṭhatu.
tika-s0202t:866_3: Jātidassanatthaṃ tiṇarukkhakīṭapaṭaṅgato paṭṭhāya loke jātivibhaṅgaṃ vitthārato kathessāmīti tesaṃ cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ desetabbamatthaṃ paṭijānāti.
tika-s0202t:866_4: Tattha aññamaññā hi jātiyoti idaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-s0202t:866_5: yasmā imā jātiyo nāma aññamaññaṃ visiṭṭhā,
tika-s0202t:867_6: Kāmaṃ “tesaṃ vohaṃ byakkhissa”nti ubhopi māṇave nissāya desanā āgatā,
tika-s0202t:867_8: jānāhī”tiādinā vāseṭṭhameva ālapanto bhagavā tameva iminā niyāmena pamukhaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0202t:867_11: jātiyā bhedo pākaṭo bhavissati nidassanena vibhūtabhāvaṃ āpāditena paṭiññātassa atthassa vibhūtabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0202t:867_12: Āma na vaṭṭatīti kammanānatāya eva upādinnanānatāya paṭikkhepapadametaṃ,
tika-s0202t:867_13: na bījanānatāya anupādinnanānatāya paṭikkhepapadanti dassetuṃ “kammaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:867_17: te taṃtaṃyonisiddhiyāva siddhā hontīti taṃ pana yonikhipanakammaṃ taṃtaṃyonivisiṭṭha-
tika-s0202t:867_19: asaṃmucchitāya eva vā paccayabhūtāya bhavapatthanāya abhisaṅkhatamevāti viññātabbapaccayavisesena vinā
tika-s0202t:867_20: phalavisesābhāvato etaṃ samīhitakammaṃ patthanādīhi ca bhinnasattitaṃ visiṭṭhasāmatthiyaṃ vā āpajjitvā
tika-s0202t:867_23: Therena hi bījanānatā viya kammanānatāpi upādinnakanānatāya siyā nu kho paccayoti codanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
tika-s0202t:867_24: paccayavisesavisiṭṭhā kammanānatā pana paccayoti nicchitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:868_1: Tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ loke abhiññātatiṇajātibhāvato visesena gayhati abhiññātasotanayena.
tika-s0202t:868_4: Na ca gayhatīti tiṇarukkhādīsu viya brāhmaṇesu jātiniyatassa liṅgassa anupalabbhanato,
tika-s0202t:868_5: pivanabhuñjanakathanahasanādikiriyāya brāhmaṇabhāvena ekantikaliṅganiyatāya mantajjhenādiṃ vinā anupalabbhanato ca.
tika-s0202t:872_0: Saññāpubbako vidhi aniccoti dassento “udake”ti āha yathā “vīrassa bhāvo vīriya”nti.
tika-s0202t:873_0: Pattasamudāye pakkhasaddoti “pattehi yantī”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo atthi.
tika-s0202t:874_1: Ettha padatthe dubbiññeyyaṃ natthīti sambandhamattaṃ dassetuṃ “tatrāyaṃ yojanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:874_3: khattiyānaṃ edisanti niyamo atthi yathā hatthiassamigādīna”nti idameva vākyaṃ sabbattha netabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:874_4: Taṃ saṃṅkhipitvā dassento “iminā nayena sabbaṃ yojetabba”nti āha.
tika-s0202t:875_0: Tassāti yathāvuttanigamanavacanassa ayaṃ yojanā idāni vuccamānā yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0202t:876_0: 457. Vokāranti vokaraṇaṃ, yena visiṭṭhatāya na vokarīyati jātibhedoti attho. Tenāha “nānatta”nti.
tika-s0202t:877_3: Sāmaññajotanā visese niviṭṭhā hotīti āha “gorakkhanti khettarakkha”nti.
tika-s0202t:877_10: usuṃ sattiñca nissāya pavattā jīvikā issattaṃ.
tika-s0202t:878_2: jānanañca porāṇehi brāhmaṇehi vihitaniyāmena brāhmaṇehi katopasamena anuṭṭhānatapena yathā “ājīvasīlācāravipanno
tika-s0202t:878_6: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ ājīvasīlācāravipannassa abrāhmaṇabhāve sati na jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti,
tika-s0202t:878_8: tasmā guṇānaṃyeva brāhmaṇabhāvakaraṇato catuvaṇṇavibhāge yattha katthaci kule jāto yo sīlādiguṇasampannatāya guṇavā,
tika-s0202t:878_9: so vuttalakkhaṇena nippariyāyato bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇoti ayamettha brāhmaṇabhāve ñāyoti,
tika-s0202t:878_12: Yo brāhmaṇassa saṃvaṇṇitāyāti mātuyā ubhatosujātatādikulavaṇṇena saṃvaṇṇitāya pasatthāya yathārūpāya brāhmaṇassa mātā bhavituṃ yuttā,
tika-s0202t:878_14: Etena catunnaṃ yonīnaṃ yattha katthaci visesaniṭṭhā katā.
tika-s0202t:878_16: Evaṃ sāmaññato visesaniṭṭhāvasena “yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti padassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni sāmaññajotanaṃ
tika-s0202t:878_18: Parisuddhauppattimaggasaṅkhātā yoni vuttāti anupakkuṭṭhabhāvena parisuddhauppattimaggasaṅkhātā yā cāyaṃ yoni vuttāti sambandho.
tika-s0202t:878_19: Tatopi jātasambhūtattāti tato yonito jātattā mātāpettisampattito sambhūtattā.
tika-s0202t:879_2: Tatheva rāgādisaṅkhātena palibodhanaṭṭhena saha palibodhenāti sapalibodho.
tika-s0202t:879_5: tasmā tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇanti attho vattabbo.
tika-s0202t:879_6: Evarūpo etissā kathāya upadeso nānappakārato vibhatto,
tika-s0202t:880_0: 458. Gahitadaṇḍesūti paresaṃ daṇḍena viheṭhanaṃ anidhāya ādinnadaṇḍesu.
tika-s0202t:882_0: Yena kāmabhavena mānusakehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi yuñjati,
tika-s0202t:882_2: “Mānusakaṃ yoga”nti ettha ca ekadesaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t:884_0: Sundaraṃ ṭhānanti nibbānaṃ. Sundarāya paṭipattiyā ariyapaṭipattiyā.
tika-s0202t:885_0: Nibbattinti pariyosānaṃ. Atīteti atītakoṭṭhāse. Kiñcanakārakoti palibodhahetubhūto.
tika-s0202t:886_0: Asekkhe sīlakkhandhādike mahante guṇe. Pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ vijitattā vijitavijayaṃ.
tika-s0202t:887_1: Idaṃ ajānantāti “jātiyā brāhmaṇo”ti idaṃ lokasamaññāmattanti ajānantā.
tika-s0202t:887_2: Ye brāhmaṇesu nāmagottaṃ nāma tatiyaṃ diṭṭhābhinivesaṃ janenti,
tika-s0202t:887_4: Kataṃ abhisaṅkhatanti parikappanavaseneva kataṃ ṭhapitaṃ tadupacitaṃ,
tika-s0202t:887_9: Sammā pana paramatthato ajānantānaṃ nāmagottaṃ evaṃ kappetīti āha “no ce”tiādi.
tika-s0202t:887_10: Taṃ pana asantampi paramatthato santatāyeva abhinivisanti,
tika-s0202t:887_16: “na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “ajānantāva evaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-s0202t:888_2: na pubbe viya “yo hi kocī”ti pariyāyavasena.
tika-s0202t:888_3: “Na jaccā”ti gāthāya pubbaddhena jātivādaṃ paṭikkhipanto pacchimaddhena kammavādaṃ patiṭṭhapento.
tika-s0202t:888_5: Upaḍḍhagāthāya vitthāraṇatthanti upaḍḍhagāthāya atthaṃ vitthāretuṃ “kassako kammunā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:888_7: pacchime dvīhi dvinnampi sādhāraṇato attho vitthārito.
tika-s0202t:889_0: Paṭiccasamuppādapadhānavacanaviññeyyo paccayo paṭiccasamuppādasaddassa attho paccayuppannāpekkhāya hotīti āha –
tika-s0202t:889_5: avamānārahe caṇḍālādikule kammavasena upapatti hoti kammassa vipaccamānokāsakaratāya vinā tādisāya uccanīcakulanibbattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0202t:890_0: Kammunāti cettha yathā lokapajāsattasaddehi eko evattho vutto,
tika-s0202t:890_2: adhippāyaviseso pana tattha atthīti dassetuṃ “purimapadena cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:890_4: Na hi sannihitakāraṇānaṃ phalānaṃ aññena uppattidiṭṭhi yujjati.
tika-s0202t:890_6: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanādīsuvuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t:890_7: Tathā lokassa paṭhamuppatti na brahmunāti “kammunā hi tāsu tāsū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:890_8: Tatiyena “ayaṃ loko ādito pabhuti pabhavakammunā vattatī”ti vuttamatthaṃ nigameti.Vuttassevatthassa sūcanañhi nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0202t:890_9: Taṃ pana niyamatthaṃ hotīti āha “kammeneva baddhā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-s0202t:891_0: Dhutadhammā visesato taṇhāya santattavasena vattantīti āha “tapenāti dhutaṅgatapenā”ti.
tika-s0202t:891_1: Methunavirati visesato brāhmaṇānaṃ brahmacariyanti sā idha brahmacariyenāti adhippetāti āha “brahmacariyenāti methunaviratiyā”ti.
tika-s0202t:891_6: So panettha atthato brāhmaṇabhāvoti āha “brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ āvahatī”ti.
tika-s0202t:892_0: Brahmā ca sakko cāti sakkagarukānaṃ sakko sakkenapi garukātabbato,
tika-s0202t:895_7: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0202t:895_8: tato etassa sampādakahetubhāvato ñāyo dhammo ariyamaggo taṃ ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ.
tika-s0202t:896_1: Vaṭṭacārakato niyyātīti niyyānikaṃ īkārassa rassattaṃ ya-
tika-s0202t:897_5: Gharāvāsakammameva pañcabalikaraṇadasaatthaṭṭhānabhāvato lokayātrāya ca sampavattiṭṭhānabhāvato jīvitavuttiyā vā hetubhāvato gharāvāsakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0202t:901_1: Ayoniso pavattitaṃ vāṇijjakammaṃ viya apāyabhūtaṃ kasikammaṃ nidassanabhāve ṭhapetvā ayonisomanasikaraṇavasena pavattaṃ gharāvāsakiccaṃ sandhāyāha –
tika-s0202t:901_4: Brāhmaṇabhatto ahosīti so kira bahū brāhmaṇe dhanaṃ datvā yaññaṃ kāresi.
tika-s0202t:901_5: Uparīti “upari upaṭṭhātīti vadehī”ti brāhmaṇehi attano samayena ācikkhāpitopi yathā upaṭṭhitameva kathetvā kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto,
tika-s0202t:901_7: “iminā amhākaṃ yaññe doso dinno”ti kujjhitvā tassa kaḷevaraṃ susānaṃ netuṃ nādaṃsu.
tika-s0202t:901_8: Athassa ñātakehi sahasse dinne taṃ sahassaṃ gahetvā gehato nīharituṃ adaṃsu.
tika-s0202t:901_11: ekā sumanamāla”ntiādinā taṃ taṃ dānamayaṃ puññaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakkassa devarañño
tika-s0202t:901_13: sakkassa devarañño vejayantarathaṃ pesetvā pakkosāpitena guttilācariyabhūtena mahābodhisattena pucchitā taṃ taṃ attanā kataṃ puññaṃ byākariṃsu.
tika-s0202t:901_15: Vaṇijjakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjamānanti ettha tassa vipajjamānākāro heṭṭhā vutto.
tika-s0202t:901_16: Evaṃ pabbajjakammaṭṭhānampi vipajjamānaṃ appaphalaṃ hotīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0202t:901_19: saddena abhiññāvipassanādisukhassa viya sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ sīlasampadādisukhassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t:902_0: Cāgasīsenāti padhānabhūtena cāgena dānena taṃ avassayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0202t:903_2: Bhagavato pana sabbaññubhāvo sadevake loke jalatale pakkhittatelaṃ viya pattharitvā ṭhito,
tika-s0202t:903_10: Tathābhūtānaṃ bhāvassapi abhāvena nihīnaṃ nāma hoti, nāma-
tika-s0202t:904_1: Katamā vācā tesaṃ seyyoti tesaṃ caṅkiyādīnaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vuccamānavibhāgāsu vācāsu katamā vācā seyyoti.
tika-s0202t:904_8: Taṃ pana ekaṃsato yuttiyuttaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0202t:904_10: Āvutotiādīsu ādito abhimukhaṃ ñāṇagatiyā vibandhanena āvuto,
tika-s0202t:905_1: Sace etaṃ kāraṇamatthīti “nissaṭṭhatiṇakaṭṭhupādāno aggi jalatī”ti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ sace atthi yadi siyā,
tika-s0202t:905_2: so aparo tiṇakaṭṭhupādāno aggi yadi bhaveyya.
tika-s0202t:905_5: Jāti ādīnaṃ abhāvenāti jātipaccayānaṃ kammakilesānaṃ niggamena.
tika-s0202t:906_1: Na niccalā tiṭṭhantīti tattha pakkhipitabbassa labbhamānattā yathāpaññattaṃ hutvā niccalā akampiyā na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0202t:907_1: So hi attano santakassa adātukāmatādivasena pavattassa akammapathappattassa musāvādabhāvassa viparīto añño idha adhippeto.
tika-s0202t:907_2: Tathā hi itaro yebhuyyena vaḷañjitabbato voharitabbato vaḷañjakamusāvādoti āha.
tika-s0202t:907_3: Na kadāci musāvādīti dve kathā na kathenti.
tika-s0202t:907_4: Bāhirakānaṃ anavajjatapasammatāyapi nissitoti vattuṃ āha “sīlavā tapanissitako hoti”ti.
tika-s0202t:908_2: Na sabbaso paccakkhā honti satisammohato maggānañca aññathā karaṇato.
tika-s0202t:909_1: Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ avikkhambhitattā “pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacara”nti āha,
tika-s0202t:909_2: tesaṃ pana vikkhambhitattā vuttaṃ “appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacara”nti.
tika-s0202t:909_7: Na ohīyati na tiṭṭhatīti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā
tika-s0202t:909_8: āsīdetvā passe ohīyakaṃ katvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāvena na tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0202t:912_3: Brāhmaṇī vigatamalamaccheratāya “tuyhaṃ deyyadhammaṃ ruccanakaṭṭhāne dehī”ti āha.
tika-s0202t:912_4: Maggeneva hissā macchariyassa pahīnattā buddhapakkhabrāhmaṇapakkhavasena ubhatopakkhikā.
tika-s0202t:913_3: Na socatīti tato eva sokaṃ nāma vināseti.
tika-s0202t:913_6: Sukhaṃ setīti kodhapariḷāhena apariḍayhamānattā sukhaṃ supati.
tika-s0202t:914_2: na sakkā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vatvā santajjetuṃ,
tika-s0202t:914_4: So ekaṃ pucchāgāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā “sace asukassa nāma vadhaṃ rocemīti vakkhati,
tika-s0202t:914_7: lokavadhāya uppanno kiṃ tuyhaṃ samaṇabhāvenāti niggahessāmi.
tika-s0202t:914_8: Sace na kassaci vadhaṃ rocemīti vakkhati,
tika-s0202t:914_9: atha naṃ tvaṃ rāgādīnampi vadhaṃ na icchasi,
tika-s0202t:914_10: tasmā samaṇo hutvā āhiṇḍasīti niggaṇhissāmīti imaṃ ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho samaṇo gotamo neva gilituṃ
tika-s0202t:914_11: na uggilituṃ sakkhissatī”ti evaṃ cintetvā imaṃ payhaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0202t:915_4: Vijjamānānanti pāḷiyaṃ anādare sāmivacananti tadatthaṃ dassento “vijjamānesū”tiāha.
tika-s0202t:915_6: pavaḍḍhaṃ vā ñāṇanti paññāṇanti bhagavato ñāṇaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t:916_9: Yasmā so taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ tathā tathā takkitvā gaṇhati,
tika-s0202t:916_11: Vīmaṃsanasīlo vīmaṃsī paccakkhabhūtamatthaṃ vīmaṃsanabhūtāya paññāya kevalaṃ vīmaṃsanato.
tika-s0202t:916_13: Yathāvuttatakkīvīmaṃsībhāvena takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ evametanti vatvā.
tika-s0202t:917_1: Aṭṭhitapadhānavatanti aññattha kismiñci puggale aṭṭhitapadhānavataṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhoto gotamassa padhānaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0202t:917_2: Sappurisapadhānavataṃ ahosi sappurisapadhānavatādhigatānaṃ etādisānaṃ arahataṃ acchariyapuggalānaṃyeva āveṇikapadhānavataṃ ahosi.
tika-s0202t:917_3: Ajānantova pakāsetīti ayaṃ pucchitamatthaṃ sayaṃ paccakkhato ajānanto eva kevalaṃ saddaṃ uppādetvāva pakāsesīti saññāya āha.
tika-s0202t:917_4: Ajānanabhāve santeti ime adhidevāti paccakkhato jānane asati.
tika-s0202t:917_8: Uccena sammatanti uccaṃ supākaṭaṃ sabbaso taruṇadārakehipi sammataṃ.
tika-s0202t:917_13: tadaññe ca manusse adhikabhāve kimeva vattabbaṃ.
